data.title: Minimal information for studies of extracellular vesicles (MISEV2023): From basic to advanced approaches
data.meta_description: Extracellular vesicles (EVs), through their complex cargo, can reflect the state of their cell of origin and change the functions and phenotypes of other cells. These features indicate strong biomark...
